Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder of a brown pottery jar, with ribbed lower body and base of one handle surviving, the interior is encrusted with a brown-yellow deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of one line of black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394136) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394136)
